rows.label: qst200203_0010
rows.name: You[ML:Dash ] are Glen, right?

rows.label: qst200203_0020
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]Just as the rumors said,
you're a sweltering man.

rows.label: qst200203_0030
rows.name: So what?

rows.label: qst200203_0040
rows.name: Why are you bastards attacking us?

rows.label: qst200203_0050
rows.name:
We heard rumors about you, and our
interest was piqued just a little bit.

rows.label: qst200203_0060
rows.name: Rumors about me?

rows.label: qst200203_0070
rows.name: I heard you're a Blade of justice.

rows.label: qst200203_0080
rows.name:
Do you really think you can save
people with something like justice?

rows.label: qst200203_0090
rows.name:
Don't ask stupid things. Of
course I can save them!

rows.label: qst200203_0100
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]Is that really so? Isn't that
just your own wishful thinking?

rows.label: qst200203_0110
rows.name: What are you saying, you bastard?

rows.label: qst200203_0120
rows.name:
Something like justice is just a
hindrance to people's survival.

rows.label: qst200203_0130
rows.name: I thought I'd teach you that.

rows.label: qst200203_0140
rows.name: Teach me? What do you understand?

rows.label: qst200203_0150
rows.name:
With this power of justice,
I will save many humans!

rows.label: qst200203_0160
rows.name: Ahh, hot, hot. Can't stand it, oi.

rows.label: qst200203_0170
rows.name:
Because of you, the temperature
around here has gone up, hasn't it?

rows.label: qst200203_0180
rows.name:
Hey, Glen. If you say you'll
stick to your justice that much[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200203_0190
rows.name:
Try investigating a woman
named Harghal in Avaritia.

rows.label: qst200203_0200
rows.name: What about that woman?

rows.label: qst200203_0210
rows.name:
She's a woman who worked as a dancer by Bahn's
side. If you investigate, you'll understand.

rows.label: qst200203_0220
rows.name:
Test whether your justice
is the real thing or not.
